content.rendered:
SOFTWARE

We'd love to meet you and let you find the perfect solution

Schedule a meeting
Learn More

Learn how our engineering software portfolio can help you

To address the ever-increasing complexity of modern product development, engineers need intelligent tools. Smart products, short design cycles, new materials and manufacturing methods. The Siemens portfolio of product development tools can unleash an unprecedented level of innovation by allowing the engineer to create a digital twin of their product. This digital twin enables simulation-driven design and optimization, as well as data-driven and physics-based decision making in your product lifecycle. Simcenter allows you to bring better products to market, faster.

Design

Learn More

NX CAD

The most powerful, flexible, and innovative product development solution in the industry, NX CAD has the features, performance, and capabilities to help you get product to market faster than ever before.

More Information
Learn More

Fibersim

The end-to-end design and manufacturing solution for composite parts. Unravel the complexities of composite materials and experience an engineering process that brings design, analysis, and manufacturing together.

More Information
Learn More

IXGEN

Initially developed for the U.S. army, IXGEN enables next-generation parametric blade design and analysis. OpenMDAO integration allows seamless trade studies and DoE to be performed so you can identify top-performing designs faster.

More Information

Analysis

Learn More

M4 Structures Studio

M4SS enables rapid concept evaluation and structural optimization of aircraft-type primary structures (e.g., fuselage, wings, and tail). Create models of complex, built-up structures, and deliver accurate and reliable geometry and finite element models for use in the conceptual design phase of engineering design.

More Information
Learn More

Simcenter Amesim

Simcenter Amesim allows system engineers to virtually assess and optimize the performance of mechatronic systems. It includes ready-to-use multi-physics libraries that combine with application and industry solutions to support designs from the early development stages until the final performance validation and controls calibration.

More Information
Learn More

Simcenter FEMAP

Simcenter Femap is an advanced engineering simulation application for creating and post-processing finite element models. With powerful CAD integration, an advanced mesher, support for multiple solvers, and an intuitive graphical interface, Femap offers a comprehensive solution to ensure your product performs as designed.

More Information
Learn More

Simcenter 3D

Simcenter 3D is a unified, scalable, open and extensible environment for 3D CAE with connections to design, 1D simulation, test, and data management. Simcenter 3D speeds the simulation process by combining best-in-class geometry editing, multi-disciplinary analysis, and optimization in one easy-to-use environment.

More Information
Learn More

Simcenter Star-CCM+

STAR-CCM+ is a complete CFD-focused multiphysics solution for the simulation of products and designs operating under real-world conditions. STAR-CCM+ enables innovation by bringing automated design exploration and optimization to the simulation toolkit of every engineer, allowing you to efficiently explore the entire design space.

More Information
Learn More

Simcenter Nastran

Simcenter NASTRAN is a multiphysics solver with a 50 year track record of delivering accurate and timely solutions to stress, vibration, buckling, thermal, acoustics, and aeroelastic finite element problems. It’s extensive capability includes nonlinear materials and loading, contact analysis, random vibration, flutter and optimization.

More Information

Other

Learn More

Heeds

HEEDS is the premier design space exploration software that enables engineers to automate design modification, analysis, and evaluation in order to come to the best solution quickly. It removes the traditional barriers associated with optimization software and thereby enables a new level of design innovation.

More Information
Learn More

pyNastran

pyNastran is an interface library to the various Nastran file formats. Using the BDF interface, you can read/edit/write Nastran geometry without worrying about field formatting. The OP2 interface allows you to read large result files quickly and efficiently. The pyNastran GUI can also be used to read in Nastran models and results.

More Information
Learn More

Training

It is equally important to have the right tools and to know how to use them effectively. Our goal is to make sure that you realize the full value of the Simcenter portfolio. M4 Engineering can help you quickly get up to speed with Simcenter tools. We offer in-class training as well as one-on-one mentoring sessions built around your needs.

More Information

Lack of resources, expertise or time?
We can help.

Early in the product development process you can explore different design options, materials and approaches. Cost of changes are low and opportunities to innovate high. Now is your chance to create game changing ideas, or brilliant solutions. Whether in conceptual design phase, or PDR, we have software and services that can make it easier. Don’t wait. Contact us.

Types of Analysis

Aeroelastic

Aeroelastic Analysis

Aeroelastic analysis can study the interaction of inertial, structural and aerodynamic forces on aircraft to prevent these problems from occurring in the actual vehicle
Learn More

STRUCTURAL

STRUCTURAL analysis

Using Structural analysis in your product development process will help reduce time to market, increase innovation and minimize costs.
Learn More

Computational Fluid Dynamics & Flow

CFD & Flow Analysis

Computationally demanding and challenged by uncertainty CFD requires a higher degree of subject matter expertise
Learn More

Kinematics, Motion & Multibody Dynamics

Kinematics, Motion & Multibody Dynamics Analysis

body text
Learn More

Electromagnetic

Electromagnetic Analysis

body text
Learn More

Durability, Fatigue & Fracture

Durability, Fatigue & Fracture Analysis

body text
Learn More

Controls, System & Performance

Controls, System & Performance Analysis

body text
Learn More

Acoustics

Acoustics Analysis

body text
Learn More

THERMAL

THERMAL Analysis

body text
Learn More

Can't Find What You're Looking For?

Schedule a meeting
Learn More
